intro: Acomastylis calthifolia, commonly known as the slender bellflower, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Campanulaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, bell-shaped flowers that typically range in color from white to pale blue. The plant grows in open, rocky habitats and is often found in coastal areas. It has slender, upright stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Acomastylis calthifolia is a perennial herb that blooms from late spring to early summer.
